data.message: You guys doing good work keep it up.... and we all love it ......facebook all the best.....

replies.message: Thanks for the compliment, Mian. We're glad you stopped by today! -Kate
my son is being blackmailed to send 2,500 or she will post inappropriate pictures to all his contacts.  the person has sent friend requests to all his contacts

Hi Paul. If someone is threatening to share things you want to keep private, asking you to send them money or anything else, you have options: http://bit.ly/23X4fMP. If someone is being bullied or harassed on Facebook, please report it: http://bit.ly/23X4fMJ. You can also find tips and resources for helping you deal with bullying and harassment here: http://bit.ly/26djlzP and on our Bullying Prevention Hub: http://bit.ly/26djjIa. Please keep in mind that if you feel someone is in immediate danger, you should contact your local authorities. -Jordan
